name: df-cntz
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccntz, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ Cntz =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s2[(+ ` s0)]s3)=(s3[(+ ` s0)]s2))}))
comment: Define the _centralizer_ of a subset of a magma, which is the set of elements each of which commutes with each element of the given subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
